sentences.en: A dozen inmates have absconded from Forest Jail in the past year.
sentences.cn: 去年共有12名犯人从福雷斯特监狱逃脱。

sentences.en: A flight of green parrots shot out of the cedar forest.
sentences.cn: 一群绿鹦鹉从杉木林里疾速飞出。

sentences.en: A forest fire is sweeping across portions of north Maine this evening.
sentences.cn: 今晚一场森林大火正席卷缅因州北部的部分地区。

sentences.en: After the Norman Conquest the forest became a royal hunting preserve.
sentences.cn: 诺曼征服之后，这片森林成为了皇家狩猎区。

sentences.en: Cast your mind back to 1978, when Forest won the title.
sentences.cn: 回想一下1978年福里斯特赢得冠军称号的时候。

sentences.en: Even carrying the camcorder while hiking in the forest was an effort.
sentences.cn: 在森林中徒步旅行时，即便带的是便携式摄像机也非常费力。

sentences.en: His home in Bexley is tucked away in a miniature forest.
sentences.cn: 他在贝克斯利的住宅坐落在一片小森林中。

sentences.en: Soldiers came charging through the forest, guns at the ready.
sentences.cn: 荷枪实弹的士兵穿过林区冲了上来。

sentences.en: The dampness of the forest did not agree with him physically.
sentences.cn: 他的身体不能适应森林的潮湿。

sentences.en: The forest below him seethed and teemed with life.
sentences.cn: 他下面的森林里处处生机勃勃。

sentences.en: The forest was dark and silent, haunted by shadows and unseen presences.
sentences.cn: 这个森林黑暗寂静，经常有幽灵和看不见的鬼怪出没。

sentences.en: The Philippines has just 6,000 square kilometres of forest left.
sentences.cn: 菲律宾只剩下6,000平方公里的森林了。

sentences.en: The situation was complicated by the spread of a serious forest fire.
sentences.cn: 一场严重的森林大火的蔓延使得形势更加复杂。

sentences.en: Tongue lolling, the dog came lolloping back from the forest.
sentences.cn: 那只狗伸着舌头从树林里蹒跚地跑回来。

sentences.en: Twenty million years ago, Idaho was populated by dense primordial forest.
sentences.cn: 2,000万年前，爱达荷州到处都是茂密的原始森林。

words.tran_cn: 林务官，护林人；森林人，森林居民

phrases.tran_cn: 森林火灾；森林大火；山火
国家森林；国有林；国有森林
热带森林，热带雨林；热带林

trans.tran_cn: 森林，丛林，（森林似的）一丛，一片
trans.tran_en: a large area of land that is covered with trees
a large area of land that is covered with trees

trans.tran_cn: 在…造林，使长满树林，使成为森林
